alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 9:32PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nuckolls and central Webster Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 932 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cowles, or 28 miles south of Hastings, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cowles around 935 PM CDT. Rosemont around 950 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Lawrence. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for south central Nebraska.
